data.title: Grace Grose Obituary
data.meta_description: Explore Grace  Grose's digital memorial and tribute page. Contribute photos, recollections, or videos, extend your condolences, and assist in preserving their legacy.
data.text: Grace GroseA memorial service will be held at 7 p.m. today, June 15, at Westminster Presbyterian Church in Corvallis for Grace Grose of Eugene, who died June 11 of a cerebral hemorrhage. She was 48.She was born Jan. 28, 1963, in Chicago to Janet Chou and David Han. She married Michael Grose on Sept. 1, 1990, in Evanston, Ill.She held a bachelor’s degree in music from Columbus State University in Georgia and a master’s degree in music from Florida State University. She worked as a professional violinist and homemaker.Survivors include her husband; a son, Joshua of Eugene; a daughter, Emily Grose of Eugene; her mother, Janet Hsu; her father; grandparents Margaret Han and Paul Han; and a sister, Joyce Gardner of Rockville, Md.Arrangements by Musgrove Family Mortuary in Eugene. Remembrances to Westminster Presbyterian Church in Corvallis.
